title: Soup It
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Salad bar, Delivery, Take-out, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located in the Markthalle together with a vegetable store and a sushi bar, is this soup and salad bar with a variety of at least three vegan soups and stews. Serves salads and pasta as well. Food is freshly made with seasonal and regional products, and without flavor enhancer or glutamate. Bread is offered for free with every dish.
